comments.body: Failures where due to #638 I re-run them

comments.author: zach-folwick
comments.body:
This resolves #609.  Previously, I could not create 'testdrive' and use `cd testdrive:`.  I can now cd to the directory, make a folder, cd into it, remove the folder.

:+1:

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Hey @JamesWTruher I like this and totally want to merge it. Can you fix the merge conflicts?

I believe the master branch of monad was updated, so you'll need to rebase the submodule PR, then update this to the new commit.

title: Bump submodule version to include the new behavior for Drive:
